name: Survive The Dead - College Project
description:
This is an FPS Zombie Shooter game that was made by me in my final year of college as a major project. This was made using unity using C#.

The Things that I learnt the most from this project are: Terrain System, NavMesh, Basic enemy AI behaviors, Collectible Items, C# class behaviors, enum types, Coroutines and to have fun while building games.
